divs: Sighting DetailsMe and some other inmates or what they call residents as they call it were on the yard probaly around 12am or later and we saw the orbs of lights over the trees right over the tree tops right outside the gates and everyone stared and tried to say it was this it was that but ive never seen anything like it in my life and the next day their were UFO sightings on t.v called Arizona lights and I was like thats the same hing we saw outside.
Summary: It was exciting their were plenty of witnesses who were in the transitional center with me and the orbs of lights were like 6-10 and it hovered over the tree tops for more than an hour and it wasnt even that far away,.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Swainsboro
There were no other sightings in Swainsboro on or around September 22nd 2010
